info:
SoundTeMP is a Korean team of video game music composers. Formed in 1992, they have been creating soundtracks for MMORPG computer games. By 2002, their work in Ragnarok Online (a highly acclaimed early MMORPG) made them famous. Their most recent work is in Granado Espada.

Another international MMORPG using game music from SoundTeMP since 2003 is FlyFF, which comes from Korea as well.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SoundTeMP]source[/url]
